sentence: The donations for the record-breaking month included nearly $2.3 million raised by the governor's election campaign team, and $8.2 million from his political committee, Friends of Ron DeSantis.
author: Ewan Palmer
title: How Ron DeSantis' Fundraising Compares to Donald Trump
